page_content:
Logging In and Edit Profile

Version:MissionOS_2.0

To log into MissionOS application, users require the URL, Username and Password. Maxwell GeoSystems provides the user with URL to MissionOS upon initial setup. This usually takes the form, ‘yoursite.maxwellgeosystems.com’, but can be configured to any domain. Often this displays as, ‘yoursite.maxwellgeosystems14.com’ where the number refers to a subdomain. In this case typing ‘yoursite.maxwellgeosystems.com’ in the browser automatically takes you to the relevant subdomain.

 

 

You can select the language of your choice from any of the languages as displayed in the drop-down. Select English, if you wish.

Existing User login

Perform the following steps:

  1. Type the username and password.
  2. Click Log In.
  3. If you don’t remember the password, click Forgot Password link.
    A new field populates where you can enter your email address and click Submit.
    A password reset link will be immediately sent to your email.

 

  1. Click the Reset button, if you require to reset the information you entered.

New User login

Admin creates the account for the new user. Your Username and Password is created and sent to you by email.
Perform the following steps:

  1. Login with the details.
  2. On the first login, you can change your password.

For this, after log in, click Edit Profile.

  1. In the popup that opens, enter the current password. Then the new password. Re-enter the new password.
  2. Click Submit.
    The new password is saved.
    Refer to the figure below for more details:
